mod.name: Bundle Of Peglin
mod.description:
Adds 25 events found in peglin to slay the spire! 
 Also includes 8 orbs and 47 relics!

cards.name: Orboros
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb
Deal 3 damage 6 times then shuffle this card into your draw pile.
bundle_of_peglin:Crit: Create a copy of this bundle_of_peglin:Orb with full charges.
Exhaustive 4.

cards.name: Orboros+
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb
Deal 4 damage 8 times then shuffle this card into your draw pile.
bundle_of_peglin:Crit: Create a copy of this bundle_of_peglin:Orb with full charges.
Exhaustive 5.

cards.name: Ball Lightning
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb
Deal 1 damage 4 times, this bundle_of_peglin:Orb ignores Block and Thorns.
bundle_of_peglin:Crit: Deal damage an additional 4 times.

cards.name: Ball Lightning+
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb
Deal 1 damage 6 times, this bundle_of_peglin:Orb ignores Block and Thorns.
bundle_of_peglin:Crit: Deal damage an additional 6 times.

cards.name: Infernorb
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb
Lose 1 HP and deal 4 damage 5 times.
bundle_of_peglin:Crit: Remove all Block from the target, then deal 4 damage 5 times and deal 35 thorns damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Infernorb+
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb
Lose 1 HP and Deal 3 damage 8 times.
bundle_of_peglin:Crit: Remove ALL block from the target, then deal 3 damage 8 times and deal 50 thorns damage to all enemies.

cards.name: Oreb
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb, bundle_of_peglin:Stone, Ethereal.
Deal 4 damage 6 times.
bundle_of_peglin:Crit: ???
This card counts as a Strike.

cards.name: Oreb+
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb, bundle_of_peglin:Stone, Ethereal.
Deal 4 damage 8 times.
bundle_of_peglin:Crit: ???
This card counts as a Strike.

cards.name: Stone
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb, bundle_of_peglin:Stone.
Deal 4 damage 2 times.
bundle_of_peglin:Crit: Attack 2 more times.
This card counts as a Strike.

cards.name: Stone+
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb, bundle_of_peglin:Stone.
Deal 4 damage 3 times.
bundle_of_peglin:Crit: Attack 3 more times.
This card counts as a Strike.

cards.name: Bramball
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb
Deal 6 damage 3 times, for each unblocked attack, the target ALWAYS loses 1 Strength.
bundle_of_peglin:Crit: bundle_of_peglin:Stun all enemies and make them bundle_of_peglin:Explosive, then exhaust this card.

cards.name: Bramball+
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb
Deal 8 damage 4 times, for each unblocked attack, the target ALWAYS loses 1 Strength.
bundle_of_peglin:Crit: bundle_of_peglin:Stun all enemies and make them bundle_of_peglin:Explosive, then exhaust this card.

cards.name: Mirrorb
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb, Unplayable.
When this card is drawn, exhaust it and replace it with another rare card in your deck.
If you have no other rare cards, add a wound to your hand instead.

cards.name: Mirrorb+
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb, Unplayable.
When this card is drawn, exhaust it make a copy of a random rare card and uncommon card in your deck, the uncommon card is free this turn.
If you have no other rare or uncommon cards, add a Wound to your hand instead for each respectively.

cards.name: Orbelisk
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb, bundle_of_peglin:Stone.
Deal 1 damage 5 times.
bundle_of_peglin:Crit: Deal half of this damage to ALL enemies.
This bundle_of_peglin:Orb 's base damage increases by 1 for ALL bundle_of_peglin:Stone.

cards.name: Orbelisk+
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb, bundle_of_peglin:Stone.
Deal 2 damage 6 times.
bundle_of_peglin:Crit: Deal ALL of this damage to ALL enemies before dealing damage.
This bundle_of_peglin:Orb 's base damage increases by 2 and attack times by 1 for ALL bundle_of_peglin:Stone.

cards.name: Terriball
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb
Deal 2 damage, Exhaust.
Its terrible!
This bundle_of_peglin:Orb cannot be removed from your deck and cannot bundle_of_peglin:Crit.

cards.name: Terriball+
cards.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Orb
Deal 3 damage 2 times, Exhaust.
Its still terrible!
This bundle_of_peglin:Orb cannot be removed from your deck and cannot bundle_of_peglin:Crit.

relics.name: Basic Blade
relics.description: Increase your attack damage by 1.
relics.flavorText: A simple utility blade, its helpful!

relics.name: Cookie
relics.description: Heal 1 HP the first two times you shuffle your draw pile each combat.
relics.flavorText: It tastes nice, and the dark chocolate flavour lingers.

relics.name: Gardener's Gloves
relics.description: Take 80% less damage from Thorns type damage.
relics.flavorText: Helps keep the brambles at bay.

relics.name: Sand Arrows
relics.description:
When you deal unblocked attack damage, you have a 2% chance to Stun the enemy.
This effect ignores artifact.
relics.flavorText: I like Sand Arrows. They are coarse and rough and irritating… and they hit everyone.

relics.name: Spiral Slayer
relics.description: Start every combat with 1 Strength and Temporary Strength.
relics.flavorText: So fancy it struggles to get to the middle of things.

relics.name: Suffer the Sling
relics.description:
All Strike cards deal 2 more damage, all bundle_of_peglin:Stone bundle_of_peglin:Orb deal 2 more damage ontop of that.
Obtain a Stone+ on pickup.
relics.flavorText: Most people consider Stones to be useless orbs, but this sling can make them shine.

relics.name: Unicorn Horn?
relics.description: When an enemy dies, draw 1 card and put 1 card on top of your deck.
relics.flavorText: Perhaps.

relics.name: Alchemist's Cookbook
relics.description: Every 15 cards played, gain a bundle_of_peglin:Bomb+ that will detonate in 3 turns.
relics.flavorText: Inside the book you find many exotic ways to destroy your enemies.

relics.name: Enhanced Gunpowder
relics.description:
When you gain a bundle_of_peglin:Bomb, draw 2 cards.
At the start of turn 4 gain a bundle_of_peglin:Bomb+.
relics.flavorText: Can be good for moving large rocks, or large enemies!

relics.name: Improved Catalyst
relics.description: When you gain a Bomb, it deals 10 more damage. At the start of turn 5 gain a lit bundle_of_peglin:Bomb+.
relics.flavorText: This genious substance makes simple explosives form a more powerful clay.

relics.name: Refreshield
relics.description:
At the start of your turn, shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile and draw 1 card.
bundle_of_peglin:Synergy: Fresh Bandana - Draw 2 more cards per turn instead.
relics.flavorText: Keeps things fresh during the heat of battle so you wont forget what you are doing.

relics.name: Super Boots
relics.description:
When you enter a "?" room, heal 2 HP.
When you enter a Rest Site, heal 5 HP.
relics.flavorText: Speedstrats not included.

relics.name: Ambidextionary
relics.description: At the start of your turn draw 1 card and discard 1 card. Raise you maximum hand size by 1.
relics.flavorText: Well isnt that handy?

relics.name: Apple a Day
relics.description: Upon pickup, gain 15 Max HP.
relics.flavorText: May or may not keep the cleric at bay.

relics.name: Bomb Baton
relics.description: At the start of combat, gain 3 Lit bundle_of_peglin:Bombs. They all deal 22 damage to all enemies and explode at the end of turns 4, 6 and 8.
relics.flavorText: Be careful when picking it up not to drop them at your feet!

relics.name: Decoy Orb
relics.description: The first time you shuffle your deck each combat, ALWAYS bundle_of_peglin:Stun ALL enemies and end your turn.
relics.flavorText: If i am not taking a turn, then neither are you!

relics.name: Eye Of The Turtle
relics.description:
Card rewards contain 2 more cards to choose from.
Elite rooms card rewards contain 5 more cards to choose from.
relics.flavorText: Slow and decisive, you will have plenty of time to consider new techniques.

relics.name: Grabby Hand
relics.description: When you deal unblocked attack damage, deal 10% + 1 of this damage to ALL enemies.
relics.flavorText: Helps you reach high places and throw things straight.

relics.name: Knife's Edge
relics.description: While your health is at or below 30%, deal 50% more damage, All Orb cards will Crit.
relics.flavorText: Small, sharp and exactly what you need in a pinch.

relics.name: Pocket Sand
relics.description: Enemies have a 5% chance to ALWAYS become bundle_of_peglin:stunned when attacking you. This effect can only happen once per turn.
relics.flavorText: Pocket sand!

relics.name: Rallying Heart
relics.description: At the end of combat, heal 1 hp and 1 more for each bundle_of_peglin:Orb in your deck.
relics.flavorText: The Orbs call out for their friends. Unite them.

relics.name: Refillibuster
relics.description: When you shuffle your draw pile, a random enemy loses hp equal to the number of cards in your deck.
relics.flavorText: Give it a swing!

relics.name: Strange Brew
relics.description: When an enemy dies or your shuffle your deck, gain 3 temporary Strength and Dexterity.
relics.flavorText: Smells like a tar milkshake

relics.name: Tactical Treat
relics.description: When you shuffle your deck, draw 2 cards and discard 2 cards.
relics.flavorText: Truly a tasty treat for anyone except your enemies!

relics.name: Well Done Steak
relics.description: The first 2 times you shuffle your deck each combat, heal 6 HP.
relics.flavorText: I dunno man, looks kinda raw to me.

relics.name: Infernal Ingot
relics.description: When you deal unblocked attack damage, heal 1 HP.
relics.flavorText: This confusing object absorbs the souls of creatures it touches, but you can take this essence back out of it later.

relics.name: Shiny Special Button
relics.description:
Every 10th bundle_of_peglin:Orb you play
gives 1 bundle_of_peglin:Critical_Power.
relics.flavorText: A button from a faraway land, it seems to have fused with some of the gold in the spire... It craves orbs to share its power with.

relics.name: Toxic Cake
relics.description:
Upon pickup, gain 5 Max HP and Upgrade all Skills in your deck.
All future Skills will be Upgraded.
relics.flavorText: Surprisingly not a lie. Packed with acidic flavours, it helps keep your skills sharp.

relics.name: Weighted Chip
relics.description:
When you play an Attack that deals damage, you have 3 outcomes:
40% - Deal 2x damage.
40% - Deal normal damage.
20% - Heal enemies for half of damage dealt.
relics.flavorText: This chip is rigged, most of the weight is stored in one side, but should it land on the soft side it lets out a cursed aura.

relics.name: Bad Cheese
relics.description:
Upon pickup gain 3 Max HP.
When you draw a card, deal 1 damage to ALL enemies.
This value increases by 1 this combat when you shuffle your deck.
relics.flavorText: The best kind of Cheese.

relics.name: Complex Claw
relics.description:
At the start of your turn gain [E], but you can no longer gain bundle_of_peglin:Critical_Power.
If you have no bundle_of_peglin:Orb#ys in your deck that can bundle_of_peglin:Crit, instead lose 1 Strength each turn.
relics.flavorText: This artisanal bladed weapon can help you to extract more from your existing techniques.

relics.name: Consuming Chalice
relics.description: Your attacks deal 4 more damage, but you draw 1 less card next turn each time you shuffle your draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Drink from the chalice!?

relics.name: Cursed Mask
relics.description: Start each combat Confused, your Attacks deal 5 more damage while you are Confused.
relics.flavorText: Its hard to see out of, but you think it makes you stronger?

relics.name: Dumb Bell
relics.description: Whenever you shuffle your deck, gain 2 Strength.
relics.flavorText: Dumbell would like you to think its the better bell because its shiny.

relics.name: Echo Chamber
relics.description:
All of your Attacks deal 2 more damage.
When you deal Attack damage, store 10% of that amount, which can round up (currently 0) and increase the damage of your next Attack by this amount.
relics.flavorText: Its kinda echoey in here.

relics.name: Electropegnet
relics.description:
At the end of your turn, for each card left:
Attack - Gain 3 Vigor.
Skill - Gain 2 Block next turn.
Power - Gain [E] and draw 1 card.
If there were 5 or more cards, gain 1 draw for the rest of combat.
relics.flavorText: The magnet is a bit too strong, and it often gets stuck to other relics.

relics.name: Fresh Bandana
relics.description:
At the start of your turn, shuffle your discard pile into your draw pile then draw 3 cards.
bundle_of_peglin:Synergy: Refreshield - Draw 2 more cards per turn.
relics.flavorText: Dont ask how the Bandana ended up in the punch bowl...

relics.name: Gift That Keeps On Giving
relics.description: At the start of your turn, lose [E] and all cards become bundle_of_peglin:Durable.
relics.flavorText: It never stops, which is both a good thing and a bad thing.

relics.name: Glorious SuffeRING
relics.description: At the start of combat, ALWAYS lose 5 Strength and Dexterity. Gain 1 Strength when you play an Attack or 1 Dexterity when playing a Skill. Power cards give 1 of each.
relics.flavorText: A little bad can do alot of good.

relics.name: Haglin's Satchel
relics.description: Upon pickup, upgrade 4 random cards. Obtain 1 card and 1 colourless card.
relics.flavorText: Probably stolen, but it contains a wealth of shiny items, so you are totally keeping it.

relics.name: Kinetic Meteorite
relics.description:
At the start of your turn draw 1 card.
Whenever you play 3 cards, draw a card.
The number of cards you need to play increases by 1 this turn when you shuffle your deck.
relics.flavorText: It still carries the energy it had when it crashed into the spire.

relics.name: Matryoshka Shell
relics.description:
Your Attacks deal 5 less damage.
All Attacks are played one additional time.
relics.flavorText: Inside the doll, you find another, but each layer is smaller than the last.

relics.name: Molten Mantle
relics.description:
bundle_of_peglin:Rare.
At the end of combat, lose all gold.
Gain a small bundle_of_peglin:buff at the start of combat for every 55 gold lost to this relic.
relics.flavorText: Its like the opposite of midas touch, gold turns to ashes that can burn your foes.

relics.name: Round Guard
relics.description: When you shuffle your deck, ALWAYS bundle_of_peglin:Stun ALL enemies. This effect then gains a cooldown of 1 turn, increasing by 1 each time it activates.
relics.flavorText: An old buckler that smells of mouldy cheese.

relics.name: Salt Shaker
relics.description:
When you draw a Slimed, Exhaust it and draw 2 cards.
At the start of combat and upon playing a Power card, add a Slimed to your discard pile and draw pile.
relics.flavorText: Meal not included.

relics.name: Sapper Sack
relics.description:
Multiply all bundle_of_peglin:Bomb#ys by 2.25x.
At the start of turn 5 and every turn afterwards, lose 3 HP.
Upon pickup obtain The Bomb.
relics.flavorText: Rigged! Its all rigged!

relics.name: Sealed Conviction
relics.description: Your Attacks deal 4 more damage, but you discard your hand when you shuffle for the first time each combat.
relics.flavorText: It seals away evil, but now its stuck to you!

relics.name: Short Fuse
relics.description:
When you gain a bundle_of_peglin:bomb, instantly detonate it.
At the start of your turn, gain a 12 damage bundle_of_peglin:bomb.
relics.flavorText: Im gonna blow!

relics.name: Wand of Skultimate Power
relics.description:
Lose 4 hp for every 20 cards played.
Your Attack damage and bundle_of_peglin:Bomb damage dealt is Doubled.
relics.flavorText: UNLIMITED POWER!!! (To make tpyos).

relics.name: Unpretentious Pendant
relics.description: Your Attacks deal 2 more damage, but you can no longer bundle_of_peglin:Crit, if you have no bundle_of_peglin:Orb cards that can crit, this bonus is halved.
relics.flavorText: Theres no need to show off, after all.

keywords.name: Bomb
keywords.description: Bombs deal X damage to ALL enemies after ending Y turns then is removed.

keywords.name: Bomb+
keywords.description: After the end of 3 turns, deal 50 damage to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Buff
keywords.description:
Randomly gain:
1 Strength, Dexterity, Metallicize, Plated Armor, Thorns, Regen, Buffer, Intangible, Artifact or Critical Power, Draw Power or Temporary HP.

keywords.name: Crit
keywords.description: When this card is played with Critical Power.

keywords.name: Durable
keywords.description:
When a Durable card is played, it returns to your hand and loses this modifier.
Durable cards do not Exhaust or get Exhausted by Ethereal.
Cannot be applied to Status cards.

keywords.name: Explosive
keywords.description: When an enemy with this dies, they deal their max HP as damage to ALL enemies.

keywords.name: Multiword Keyword
keywords.description: Make sure the first element in the NAMES is the same as your PROPER_NAME. The rest should use _ to replace spaces and be entirely lowercase. In card text, you'll use the underscore versions.

keywords.name: Orb
keywords.description: Orb's are cards that when played will add charge towards Critical Power. Some orbs can Crit.

keywords.name: Rare
keywords.description: Spawns less often than other Relics of its type.

keywords.name: Stone
keywords.description: Stones contribute to the Orbelisk and can be boosted by some relics.

keywords.name: Stun
keywords.description: The enemy will skip its next turn

keywords.name: Synergy
keywords.description: This item has additional effects with other items.

keywords.name: This is displayed in the tooltip.
keywords.description: This is displayed in the tooltip. Note, spaces are not allowed in NAMES. Also, they should be entirely lowercase. For multi-word keywords, see the next one.
